actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-299.
Measure laid on table in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3641, a bill to extend for 3 fiscal years the expiring health information programs under title XVII of the Public Health Service Act, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3641 (Health information programs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 3641, a bill to extend for 3 fiscal years the expiring health information programs under title XVII of the Public Health Service Act, and for other purposes.
